title: Print, "Temple of Venus in Rome", after 1759
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Mrs. George Pendleton
description: Horizontal rectangle. In mid-distance the ruins of the Temple of Venus; the apse at the right; marble pieces in foreground. A group of figures at left. Inscribed, lower right: "G.B. Piranesi Archt. incise"; along lower margin: "Veduta degli avanzi di due Tricliny ... Campo Vaccino"; lower left: "Presso l'autore ... Mezzo"

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Temple of Venus in Rome", after 1759.
after 1759. Etching. Gift of the Estate of Mrs. George Pendleton. 1939-9-4.
